channel.title: Certain players ::pickup command?

item.title: Certain players ::pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME") | equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME")){ String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Invalid code ::pickup ID"); }

I think it’s something similar to this, haven’t needed to use this method in a while

item.title: Certain players ::pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

I was wondering can anyone add spots for certain donators name?
I do not want all donators getting bank nor spawn

    if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > ) {
	        String[] args = command.split(" ");
         if(args.length == 3) {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			sM("No such item.");
		}
	} else {
		sM("Invalid code ::pickup ID");
	}
